subject: AI & Agents
title: The Productivity Paradox
description: A quick win: understand The Productivity Paradox.

hook.text: Every company deploys AI. Productivity should soar. Instead, gains are modest. Why?

buildup.text: New technology takes decades to reshape workflows. Computers took 20 years to boost productivity.

discovery.text: AI tools save time on individual tasks but organizations haven't redesigned processes around them.

twist.text: Workers sometimes spend the saved time checking AI outputs â€” a hidden tax on automation.

climax.text: The real gains will come when entire workflows, not just tasks, are reimagined.

punchline.text: The tool is fast. The organization is slow.

quiz.question: Why hasn't AI dramatically boosted productivity yet?
options: Organizations haven't redesigned workflows around AI
